pages.title: Crab
pages.text: Residents of the beach, they like to pinch you if you walk barefoot.$(br)Cooked crab legs are considered a delicacy. But if you can get their shell, you will be able to brew a new potion.

pages.name: Crab
pages.text: Have you ever seen the fabled Giant Crab? It is said it could appear during a thunderstorm.
